entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 33 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 33 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
